Title: Serve the workers, peasants and soldiers, link oneself with the workers, peasants and soldiers!
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社)
Notes: A cultural troupe tours the countryside to perform model operas (including the Story of the Red Lantern).
Theme: Model Operas (Yangbanxi)Up to the mountains, down to the villages (1968)
Tags: The Legend of the Red Lantern
